      • name

        HilbertSpaceFillingCurve3D.SubCurve3D name()

      • rotateOneThirdDiagonalPos

        private HilbertSpaceFillingCurve3D.HilbertCurve3D rotateOneThirdDiagonalPos​(boolean direction)
        Rotate about the normal diagonal (the 000->111 diagonal). This simply involves rotating the bits of all npoint values either left or right depending on the direction of rotation, normal or reversed (positive or negative).

      • rotateOneThirdDiagonalNeg

        private HilbertSpaceFillingCurve3D.HilbertCurve3D rotateOneThirdDiagonalNeg​(boolean direction)
        Rotate about the neg-x diagonal (the 100->011 diagonal). This is similar to the normal diagonal rotation, but with x-switched, so we XOR the x value before and after the rotation, and rotate in the opposite direction to specified.

      • rotateAboutX

        private HilbertSpaceFillingCurve3D.HilbertCurve3D rotateAboutX()
        Rotate about the x-axis. This involves leaving x values the same, but xOR'ing the rest.

      • buildCurveTree
